headline: Mondelez International (MDLZ) Exceeds Expectations and Revises 2024 Growth Outlook
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Consumer Stocks to Buy for a Retirement Portfolio. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) stands against other consumer stocks to buy for a retirement stock portfolio. Today’s retirees face growing uncertainty about the future of Social Security. While […]
